features.title: Features

multiPlatform.title: Multi-Platform Content
multiPlatform.description: Create content for social media, blogs, emails, video scripts, and more with specialized formats for each platform.

research.description: Enhance your content with Perplexity's Deep Research capabilities, providing accurate and timely information from reliable sources.

export.title: Export Options
export.description: Easily export your content as plain text, markdown, or copy directly to your clipboard.

smallBusiness.title: Small Businesses
smallBusiness.description: Produce professional, on-trend content without the expense of a dedicated marketing team.

personal.title: Personal Expression
personal.description: Share your hobbies, interests, and experiences with personalized content for social media, blogs, or newsletters that reflect your unique voice.

partnership.title: Human-AI Partnership
partnership.subtitle: We believe in amplifying human creativity, not replacing it

principle1.title: Transparent AI Capabilities
principle1.description: We clearly communicate what our AI can and cannot do, so you're always in control.

principle2.title: Human-Centered Design
principle2.description: Our interface adapts to your workflow, putting powerful AI tools at your fingertips without getting in the way.

principle3.title: Meaningful Engagement
principle3.description: We measure success by the quality of your content, not just how much time you spend on our platform.

demo.title: Experience the Difference
demo.description: Try our human-centered approach to AI content creation and see the impact it has on your workflow.

apiInstructions.title: API Setup Required
apiInstructions.description: To use this feature, you need to set up your API key:

anthropic.title: Anthropic Claude API Setup
anthropic.step1: Sign up for an Anthropic account at anthropic.com
anthropic.step2: Generate an API key in your Anthropic dashboard
anthropic.step3: Add your API key to the .env.local file in your project

perplexity.title: Perplexity API Setup
perplexity.step1: Sign up for a Perplexity account at perplexity.ai
perplexity.step2: Generate an API key in your Perplexity dashboard
perplexity.step3: Add your API key to the .env.local file in your project

aiPowered.description: Generated with Claude 3.7 Sonnet, optimized with trend research.

capabilities.title: AI Capabilities
capabilities.content: This system can create content based on trending topics
capabilities.research: This system can research topics from multiple sources
capabilities.rewrite: This system can rewrite content in different styles
capabilities.summarize: This system can summarize long-form content
capabilities.translate: This system can translate content to multiple languages
capabilities.factCheck: AI may generate inaccurate information. Always verify important facts.
capabilities.outdated: AI knowledge may be outdated for very recent events.
capabilities.bias: AI may exhibit biases present in its training data.

featureRealTime.title: Real-Time Trend Research & Analysis
featureRealTime.description: DeepContent doesn't rely on outdated techniques or static models. For every content creation task, it performs fresh research to identify what's actually working now.
featureRealTime.highlight: What worked 6 months ago often fails today. DeepContent ensures your content uses techniques and approaches that are effective in the current digital environment.
featureRealTime.point1: Analyzes current trends in digital communication for each platform
featureRealTime.point2: Identifies persuasion and attention-grabbing techniques that are working now
featureRealTime.point3: Adapts content strategies to break through today's digital noise

howItWorks.title: How DeepContent Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get the most out of our AI-powered content creation platform with this guide

step1.title: Select Your Content Type & Platform
step1.description: Begin by choosing the type of content you want to create and the platform where you'll share it. This helps our AI format your content appropriately.
step1.tip: Be specific about your platform (like Instagram or LinkedIn) to get better-optimized content recommendations.

step2.title: Define Your Audience & Topic
step2.description: Provide details about your target audience and the specific topic you want to address. The more specific you are, the more tailored your content will be.
step2.tip: Include your audience's pain points or interests to make your content more relevant to their needs.

step3.title: Enhance With Analysis Tools
step3.description: Optionally use our analysis tools to enrich your content creation process:
step3.youtubeTranscript: YouTube Transcript Analysis: Analyze existing videos on your topic for insights
step3.imageAnalysis: Image Analysis: Get Claude to analyze images related to your content for additional context
step3.tip: These analysis tools provide deeper insights and make your content more comprehensive and relevant.

step4.title: Generate & Refine Content
step4.description: Our AI will generate high-quality content based on your inputs. You can then refine it to match your exact needs:
step4.regenerate: Regenerate content if the first version doesn't meet your needs
step4.adjust: Adjust the AI style intensity for more or less personality
step4.export: Export or copy the final content for immediate use
step4.tip: Try different AI personas (like AriaStar for a friendly tone or TechExpert for a more professional style) to match your brand voice.

specific.title: Be Specific With Your Inputs
specific.description: The more specific your topic and audience details, the better your content will be. Vague inputs lead to generic content.

analysis.title: Use Analysis Tools
analysis.description: The YouTube transcript and image analysis features can significantly enhance your content with additional insights and context.

personas.title: Experiment With Personas
personas.description: Different AI personas create content with distinct voices. Try several to find the one that best matches your brand tone.

iterate.title: Iterate and Refine
iterate.description: Don't settle for the first draft. Regenerate content with tweaked inputs until you get the perfect result for your needs.

howItWorks.needMoreHelp: Need more help? Check out our

appBenefits.title: DeepContent App Benefits
appBenefits.subtitle: Discover what makes our AI-powered content creation platform special

benefit1.title: AI-Powered Speed
benefit1.description: Create high-quality content in minutes, not hours

benefit2.title: Research-Driven Content
benefit2.description: Leverage AI research capabilities for accurate, up-to-date content

benefit3.title: Multi-Platform Optimization
benefit3.description: Content specifically optimized for each platform's unique requirements

feature1.title: Claude 3.7 Sonnet AI Integration
feature1.description: Powered by Anthropic's advanced Claude 3.7 Sonnet model, DeepContent leverages one of the most capable AI systems available today to generate human-quality content.
feature1.point1: Advanced understanding of content needs and context
feature1.point2: Natural, flowing text that reads like human-written content
feature1.point3: Adaptable to different tones, styles, and brand voices

feature2.title: Multimedia Analysis Tools
feature2.description: Unlike basic AI content tools, DeepContent integrates multimedia analysis capabilities to enrich your content creation process.
feature2.point1: YouTube Transcript Analysis: Extract insights from video content
feature2.point2: Image Analysis: Leverage Claude's vision capabilities to analyze images
feature2.point3: Cross-reference multiple sources for more comprehensive content

feature3.title: AI Personas & Writing Styles
feature3.description: Choose from a variety of AI personas, each with their own distinct writing style and tone, to match your brand voice perfectly.
feature3.point1: AriaStar: Friendly, conversational tone ideal for social content
feature3.point2: TechExpert: Professional, detailed style for technical content
feature3.point3: Adjustable intensity settings to fine-tune your preferred style
feature3.researchNote: Our 9 customer personas were created by DeepContent itself through comprehensive trend analysis and audience research. These personas represent the most effective communication styles that break through the noise in today's crowded digital landscape.

feature4.title: Platform-Specific Optimization
feature4.description: DeepContent is more than a generic content generator. It understands the unique requirements of different platforms and content types.
feature4.point1: Automatically formats content based on platform best practices
feature4.point2: Incorporates platform-specific elements like hashtags, emojis, and CTAs
feature4.point3: Optimized for specific platforms including Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, and more

featureRealTime.title: Real-Time Trend Research & Analysis
featureRealTime.description: DeepContent doesn't rely on outdated techniques or static models. For every content creation task, it performs fresh research to identify what's actually working now.
featureRealTime.highlight: What worked 6 months ago often fails today. DeepContent ensures your content uses techniques and approaches that are effective in the current digital environment.
featureRealTime.point1: Analyzes current trends in digital communication for each platform
featureRealTime.point2: Identifies persuasion and attention-grabbing techniques that are working now
featureRealTime.point3: Adapts content strategies to break through today's digital noise

time.title: Save Time & Resources
time.description: Create content in minutes that would normally take hours. DeepContent handles the research and writing, allowing you to focus on strategy and refinement.

quality.title: Professional-Quality Content
quality.description: Access professional-level content creation capabilities without hiring expensive writers or agencies. Our AI produces polished, engaging content every time.

versatility.title: Versatile Content Types
versatility.description: From social media posts to detailed blog articles, YouTube scripts to email newsletters, DeepContent handles virtually any content format you need.

consistency.title: Consistent Brand Voice
consistency.description: Maintain a consistent tone and style across all your content with our AI personas. Once you find your preferred style, you can apply it to all your content.

appBenefits.learnMore: Want to learn how to use these features? Check out our

infoBanner.newUser: New to DeepContent? Learn more about our platform:

personasShowcase.title: AI Personas for Every Use Case
personasShowcase.subtitle: DeepContent is designed for everyone. Our AI personas are versatile and can be used for both business and personal content creation.
personasShowcase.techExpertDesc: Precise, detailed, and analytically-focused. Ideal for technical documentation, product specs, and industry analysis.
personasShowcase.executiveBriefDesc: Concise, strategic, and outcome-focused. Communicates high-level insights with clarity and impact.
personasShowcase.marketProDesc: Persuasive, benefit-focused, and conversion-oriented. Creates compelling marketing content that drives action.
personasShowcase.ariaStarDesc: Friendly, conversational, and engaging. Creates content that feels personal and connects emotionally with the audience.
personasShowcase.creativeSpiritDesc: Imaginative, expressive, and vibrant. Brings a creative flair to content with rich descriptions and engaging narratives.
personasShowcase.contentCoachDesc: Supportive, instructional, and motivational. Creates content that guides, teaches, and inspires action.
personasShowcase.dataNarratorProDesc: Analytical, insightful, and evidence-based. Transforms complex data into clear, actionable narratives.
personasShowcase.storyWeaverDesc: Narrative-focused, emotionally resonant, and memorable. Crafts compelling stories that capture attention and stay with the audience.
personasShowcase.trendSpotterDesc: Current, relevant, and culturally aware. Creates content that connects with the latest trends while maintaining authenticity.
personasShowcase.customNote: Each persona adapts to both business and personal contexts. Choose based on your content goals rather than use case. Feel free to experiment with different personas to find your perfect match.
